name: Fahim Anwar
bio: Fahim Anwar is a talented comedian with multiple characters up his sleeve. He was featured on season 5 of Guy Code for MTV, and his recent FILM/TV credits include Neighbors, Kirstie, @midnight, and Chuck. You can see Fahim in Tina Fey’s war comedy film, based on Kim Barker’s memoir, titled “Whiskey Tango Foxtrot,” which was just released this March, 2016. Up next, you can catch Fahim's first one-hour special on Seeso.
